text: Dana Elaine Owens (born March 18, 1970 in Newark, New Jersey), known professionally as Queen Latifah is an American, rapper, actress and singer. After she signed with Tommy Boy Records in 1989, Latifah released her first album All Hail the Queen. She has won a Golden Globe award, two Screen Actors Guild Awards, two Image Awards, a Grammy Award, six additional Grammy nominations, an Emmy Award nomination and an Academy Award nomination. She is in a partnership with Eboni Nichols and has a son Rebel. == Discography == Studio albums * All Hail the Queen (1989) * Nature of a Sista' (1991) * Black Reign (1993) * Order in the Court (1998) * The Dana Owens Album (2004) * Trav'lin' Light (2007) * Persona (2009) ==Filmography== ===Movies=== Year Title Role Notes 1991 Jungle Fever Lashawn 1991 House Party 2 Zora 1991 Yakety Yak, Take it Back Herself 1992 Juice Ruffhouse M.C. 1992 Trash Talk Herself 1993 Who's the Man?
